extends AbstractReportable

deleteTempFilesOnClose

protected boolean deleteTempFilesOnClose
Delete temporary files flag: if true, delete temporary files.

failFastLimit

protected int failFastLimit
Framework fail fast limit. Processing of a given source unit is terminated once the number of detected errors exceeds the limit. A limit of 0 indicates no fail fast, i.e., process and report all errors.

jhove2Home

protected String jhove2Home
JHOVE2 home directory (from environment; defaults to user directory

setFailFastLimit

public void setFailFastLimit(int failFastLimit)
Set fail fast limit. A value of 0 means there will be no fast failure. In other words, JHOVE2 will continue to process regardless of the number of errors.

Parameters:
failFastLimit - Fail fast limit

setTempDirectory
